listAsq.title: Who buys coffee makers?
listAsq.content:
When you need to sell your coffee maker or coffee machine, there are several options in the US market. While Facebook Marketplace and eBay exist, these platforms make selling coffee machines time-consuming. Local pawnshops typically offer minimal value when you pawn a coffee maker or sell a coffee machine to them.
We specialize in buying coffee makers and coffee machines at competitive prices. Unlike traditional pawnshops that undervalue coffee makers, we offer fair market rates. Sell your coffee maker to us today and get paid immediately with our streamlined process.

listAsq.title: How do I sell my coffee maker?
listAsq.content:
Our coffee machine buying process makes it easy to sell your coffee maker:
  • Take several photos of your coffee machine
  • Send the photos and model details through your preferred messaging platform (Facebook Messenger, WhatsApp, iMessage, or Instagram)
  • Within 10-15 minutes, you'll receive our offer to buy your coffee maker
  • If you accept our price to purchase your coffee machine, we'll schedule a convenient meeting
  • After our specialist verifies your coffee maker's functionality, you'll receive immediate payment through your preferred method - cash, Zelle, PayPal, Cash App, or Venmo

listAsq.title: Do you provide pickup service?
listAsq.content: Yes, when you sell your coffee maker to us, we offer same-day or next-day pickup throughout Florida. Unlike traditional pawnshops, we come to you - and our pickup service is completely free. Miami residents can also visit our office to sell their coffee machines directly.

listAsq.title: How quickly will I receive payment?
listAsq.content: When you sell your coffee maker to us, payment is processed immediately after inspection. If no undisclosed defects are found in your coffee machine, you'll receive the full quoted amount. Unlike typical pawnshops that make you wait, we offer instant payment through cash, Zelle, Cash App, or PayPal when you sell your coffee maker to us.

listAsq.title: I'm outside Florida - can I ship my coffee maker?
listAsq.content: Absolutely! You can still sell your coffee machine to us from any state. Simply send photos and model information of your coffee maker through messenger. Once you accept our offer, ship your coffee machine to us - we cover all shipping and insurance costs. Unlike local pawnshops that require in-person visits, we make it easy to sell your coffee maker from anywhere. Payment is processed the day we receive your coffee machine through Cash App, PayPal, Venmo, or Zelle.

listAsq.title: What types and models of coffee makers do you purchase?
listAsq.content:
Our coffee maker buying service accepts all major types including drip coffee makers, single-serve coffee machines, espresso machines, French presses, percolators, and cappuccino/latte makers. Unlike limited pawnshops, we buy all coffee maker brands.
Sell your coffee machine from any of these popular brands: Keurig, Nespresso, Breville, Cuisinart, De'Longhi, Hamilton Beach, Ninja, Mr. Coffee, Krups, Black+Decker, Technivorm, Jura, Saeco, Melitta, KitchenAid, Capresso, Rancilio, La Marzocco, Philips, Gaggia, Bosch, and many others.
